name: Escape the Pit!
description:
The little Soldier Ant got stuck in the trash bin, and must find his way back to ant civilization. Shoot your way out of the pit of trashy horrors to reach the top and be free.

Mouse to aim, left-click to shoot

WASD or Arrows to move, Space or UP to jump

As simple as that. This is our first game so it was a great learning experience.

Code/Animation: Casapciuc Elena
Code: Timoftii Victor
Art: Naghirneac Roman

Background song is by www.bensound.com

Update 2016-12-15: Changed to fixed resolution 600x600 for web and 1024 by 1024 for standalone windows version.
